channel.title: mircroprocessor on Alok's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in mircroprocessor on Alok's Blog

item.description: one pass assembler: converts whole at one, jmp instruction references made after assembly two pass: converts in two steps : first generates a symbol table of names and labels used in programs and calculate their relative addresses, then converts the instructions into machine code in the next cycle of assembly, more efficient and easier than first Linking: can link multiple obj files into one and forms exe file additional files that can be produced by the linker .
